snippet: After an agreement was signed linking the economies of eastern and southern Africa, momentum has continued for a long-term dream: a continental trading zone.
abstract: Leaders attending African Union summit meeting in Johannesburg are expected to begin negotiating plan to create free-trade zone that encompasses entire continent; negotiations follow agreement signed by 26 African nations to create Tripartite Free Trade Area, which will reduce tariffs and join three existing regional trade groups of nations.
lead_paragraph: After an agreement was signed linking the economies of eastern and southern Africa, momentum has continued for a long-term dream: a continental trading zone.

headline.main: Talks to Begin on Creating a Trade Zone Within Africa
headline.print_headline: Talks to Begin on Creating a Trade Zone Within Africa
